Pedestrians walk towards the Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus train station at dusk in Mumbai, India, on Wednesday, Oct. 4, 2023.

articles.content: An upside breakout above the current trend high of 3.45 triggers a potential continuation of the rising trend. Natural gas continues to show strength as it is holding above support of the 200-Day EMA… [+1592 chars]
